schema.description:
资源ID。取值：直播域名。
N的取值范围为**1~50**。

400.errorMessage: You have entered too many tags.
The number of System Tag exceeds 50.
The number of Custom Tag exceeds 20.

title: 添加Live资源标签
description: 单用户调用频率为100次/秒。
extraInfo:
### 特殊错误码
|错误代码  |描述  |Http状态码  |语义 |
|------------|--------|---------|------|
|InvalidRegionId.Malformed |The specified RegionId is invalid. |400 |RegionId无效|
|Resource.NotExist |Resources doesn't exist. |400 |Resource不存在|
|TagKeyIsInvalid |The specified TagKey is invalid. |400 |TagKey格式错误|
|TooManyTags |Too many tags. |400 |Tag超限|
|TagValueIsInvalid |The specified TagValue is invalid. |400 |TagValue格式错误|
|TagKeyRepeated |The specified TagKey is duplicated. |400 |TagKey存在重复值|
|TagIsInvalid |The number of Tag exceeds 20. |400 |Tag不能超过20|
|ResourceIdIsInvalid |The number of ResourceId exceeds 50. |400 |ResourceId不能超过50个|
|SystemTagIsInvalid |The number of System Tag exceeds 50. |400 |系统标签累计不能超过50个|
|CustomTagIsInvalid |The number of Custom Tag exceeds 20. |400 |用户标签累计不能超过20个|
